data.title: Privacy Policy
data.meta_description: Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make a purchase from https://www.duffypng.com What Personal Information do we collect? Duffy Cafe collects Personal Information from a variety of sources including from members of the public, advertisers, prospective employees, mailing
data.meta_site_name: Duffy Café - Duffy Café, delivering Papua New Guinea's best coffee to your door.
data.text:
We obtain most Personal Information through Duffy Cafe account registration process and updates to account details. You may provide information when you request or acquire a product or service from Duffy Cafe or its related companies, provide a product or service to Duffy Cafe, complete a survey or questionnaire, enter a competition, participate in forums or when you communicate with Duffy Cafe by email, telephone or in writing (for example if you contact customer service or provide feedback).

We also obtain information through device technologies called ‘Cookies’. Cookies are data files placed on your device or computer and often include an anonymous unique identifier. You may configure your browser so that you are notified before a cookie is downloaded or so that your browser does not accept cookies. Duffy Cafe may use the information contained in cookies to make assumptions about the user of the computer and to provide users of that computer with focused advertising that Duffy Cafe believes may be of interest, based on that information. In some cases a web page might contain more than one cookie, the information gathered from these different cookies is used to build statistical and demographical information which does not identify you personally to advertisers and other third parties for marketing, or promotional purposes.

To disable your cookies, please refer to the help menu within your Internet browser. However, cookies allow you to take full advantage of some of Duffy Cafe’s coolest features, and we recommend that you leave them turned on.

From time to time, Duffy Cafe collects information via indirect collection. Duffy Cafe endeavours to collect personal information about an individual only from that individual. However, in some circumstances, Duffy Cafe may obtain personal information from a third party. If you provide personal information about another person to Duffy Cafe, Duffy Cafe requires that you inform that person you have done so and provide them with a copy of this policy.

Duffy Cafe may use the information it collects from you for the primary purpose for which it is collected and for such other secondary purposes that are related to the primary purpose of collection. Duffy Cafe generally uses personal information to:

If you make an access request, please use the contact information below. Duffy Cafe will ask you to verify your identity and specify what information you require. If you are a resident of the European Union we are processing your information in order to fulfil contracts we have with you (for example, if you make an order through the Site), or otherwise our legitimate business interests listed above. Additionally, please note that your information will be transferred outside of Europe.

Duffy Cafe may also provide your information to:

Third parties engaged by Duffy Cafe to perform functions on its behalf, such as processing credit card information, order fulfilment, mailouts, shipping, debt collection, marketing, research and advertising;

Third parties authorised by you to receive information held by Duffy Cafe.

We use the WooCommerce e-commerce platform to power our online store – you can read more about how WooCommerce uses your Personal Information here: https://woocommerce.com/documentation/get-help/woocommerce-com/privacy/.

We also use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the Site – you can read more about how Google uses your Personal Information here: https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/.
